Early threat detection isn’t about preventing a breach someday: it’s about protecting the revenue you’re supposed to earn every day.
Companies that treat cybersecurity as a

item.title: Fedora Linux 43 released (Fedora Magazine)
item.description:
The Fedora Project has announced the release of Fedora Linux 43, with "what's new" articles for Fedora Workstation, Fedora KDE Plasma Desktop, and Fedora Atomic Desktops.

For those of you installing fresh Fedora Linux 43 Spins, you may be greeted with the new Anaconda WebUI. This was the default installer interface for Fedora Workstation 42, and now it's the default installer UI for the Spins as well.

If you are a GNOME desktop user, you'll also notice that the GNOME is now Wayland-only in Fedora Linux 43. GNOME upstream has deprecated X11 support, and has disabled it as a compile time default in GNOME 49. Upstream GNOME plans to fully remove X11 support in GNOME 50.

See the release notes for a full list of changes in Fedora 43.

item.title: US Crypto Bill Has Until February Before It’s “Dead,” Top Senator Warns
item.description:
Senator Thom Tillis has warned that Congress has faced a tight deadline to advance the US Crypto Bill, saying lawmakers must act by February before upcoming elections halt progress on defining digital asset regulations.

The post US Crypto Bill Has Until February Before It’s “Dead,” Top Senator Warns appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Crypto PACs Build $263M War Chest Ahead of 2026 US Midterm Elections
item.description:
The crypto industry has built a $263 million campaign war chest ahead of the 2026 midterms, surpassing oil and gas spending in 2024.

The post Crypto PACs Build $263M War Chest Ahead of 2026 US Midterm Elections appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Metaplanet Launches $500M Share Buyback to Fix Bitcoin Premium Gap
item.description:
Metaplanet authorized repurchase of up to 150 million shares over 12 months as the Tokyo-listed firm became Asia's first major Bitcoin treasury company to trade below its crypto reserves amid industry-wide premium compression.

The post Metaplanet Launches $500M Share Buyback to Fix Bitcoin Premium Gap appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Binance Coin Price Prediction: Is BNB About to Pump as Anonymous Fans Unveil Golden CZ Statue in Washington Today?
item.description:
A statue of the founder of Binance, Changpeng Zhao, will be exhibited in Washington this week, after this iconic individual received President Trump’s pardon. The move could favor a bullish Binance Coin price prediction, and here’s why.“It wasn’t a crime, that he was persecuted by the Biden administration, and so, I gave him a pardon […]

The post Binance Coin Price Prediction: Is BNB About to Pump as Anonymous Fans Unveil Golden CZ Statue in Washington Today? appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Prediction: BTC Price Stalls Around $115K As Traders Anticipate China Trade Deal Resolution
item.description:
Investors eye the $115K ceiling—Bitcoin price prediction signals a crucial turning point before the China trade resolution.

The post Bitcoin Price Prediction: BTC Price Stalls Around $115K As Traders Anticipate China Trade Deal Resolution appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: SEC Poised to Approve HBAR ETF — Hedera’s Gregg Bell Calls It ‘New Chapter’ for Regulated Crypto Access
item.description:
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) is expected to approve the first Hedera and Litecoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs), according to Bloomberg analyst Eric Balchunas, who confirmed that listing notices for Bitwise Solana, Canary Litecoin, and Canary HBAR have been posted and are scheduled to go live on October 28.

The post SEC Poised to Approve HBAR ETF — Hedera’s Gregg Bell Calls It ‘New Chapter’ for Regulated Crypto Access appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Circle Launches Arc Testnet With BlackRock, Visa, and AWS — A New Era for Onchain Finance?
item.description:
Circle Internet Group (NYSE: CRCL) has launched the public testnet for Arc, its open Layer-1 blockchain designed to bring more economic activity onchain.

The post Circle Launches Arc Testnet With BlackRock, Visa, and AWS — A New Era for Onchain Finance? appeared first on Cryptonews.
